au.gov.ga.conn4d.impl.collision

Class Intersector_2D_Shapefile

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.gov.ga.conn4d.impl.collision.Intersector_2D_Shapefile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Intersector

    public class Intersector_2D_Shapefile
extends java.lang.Object
implements Intersector
    Performs basic intersection operations associated with a shapefile.
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Intersector_2D_Shapefile()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long intersect(double x, double y)
      Intersects the position given by the x,y pair with the shapefile and returns the long value corresponding to the ID of the intersected polygon.
      long intersect(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Detects whether the line between the two x,y pairs intersects the shapefile
      boolean intersects(double x, double y)
      Identifies whether a given x,y position intersects the provided shapefile.

    • Method Detail

      • intersect

        public long intersect(double x,
             double y)
        Intersects the position given by the x,y pair with the shapefile and returns the long value corresponding to the ID of the intersected polygon. If no intersection was detected, the value of NO_INTERSECTION is returned, currently implemented as Long.MIN_VALUE.
        Specified by:
        intersect in interface Intersector
        Parameters:
        x - - x position
        y - - y position

      • intersect

        public long intersect(double x1,
             double y1,
             double x2,
             double y2)
        Detects whether the line between the two x,y pairs intersects the shapefile
        Specified by:
        intersect in interface Intersector
        Parameters:
        x1 - - the initial x coordinate
        y1 - - the initial y coordinate
        x2 - - the terminal x coordinate
        y2 - - the terminal y coordinate

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(double x,
                 double y)
        Identifies whether a given x,y position intersects the provided shapefile.
        Specified by:
        intersects in interface Intersector
        Parameters:
        x - - x position
        y - - y position
